meanings.definition: A piece of jewelry worn in a pierced hole in the lip.
meanings.sent1: She proudly displayed her shiny labrets in her lip.
meanings.sent2: Many cultures have traditions of wearing labrets for adornment.
meanings.sent3: The labrets in her lip jingled like tiny bells when she spoke.
meanings.sent4: Her labrets were like little drops of color against her pale skin.
meanings.sent5: The gleam of her labrets caught the sunlight, drawing everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The ancient art of labrets has been passed down through generations.
meanings.sent2: Some people find meaning and beauty in the tradition of labrets.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he was a master of labrets, even though he had never worn one.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, labrets are the ultimate statement of style.
meanings.sent5: The ceremony included a ritual of presenting labrets to signify unity and respect.

meanings.definition: A type of body modification involving the lip.
meanings.sent1: Her unique labrets were a symbol of her individuality.
meanings.sent2: The art of labrets allows for creative expression through body modification.
meanings.sent3: He pretended to have invisible labrets, making everyone laugh at the absurdity.
meanings.sent4: Labrets can be seen as a form of artistry on the canvas of the human body.
meanings.sent5: The intricate designs of her labrets told a story of tradition and culture.
